Summary: I saw a green light in the sky in Phoenix. It was flying horizontally. It lasted less than a minute. It disintegrated into thin air and dissappeared.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There was one other sighting in Phoenix on or around September 14th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a green glowing light in the night sky in Phoenix tonight. At first I thought it was a green firecracker, but it was flying horizontally. It didn't last long, less than a minute. I've never seen anything like it before. It looked like a green fireball and dissappeared into thin air. I couldn't think of a practical explanation for the object I saw. It was fairly close to where I was standing outside in the backyard. I later looked online and thought maybe it could be a military flare, but I don't know of glowing green military flares. I felt confused and wanted to make sense of what I saw, but I couldn't. I was at my parent's house, but I was the only one outside who witnessed this event. I wished I had it on video but it happened so fast.
